00031 const char *XDSO::s_trace_names[] = {

00035 XDSO::XDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00036            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00037            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00038            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,

00040     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00041     m_average(create<XUIntNode>("Average", false)),
00042     m_singleSequence(create<XBoolNode>("SingleSequence", false)),
00043     m_trigSource(create<XComboNode>("TrigSource", false)),
00044     m_trigFalling(create<XBoolNode>("TrigFalling", false)),
00045     m_trigPos(create<XDoubleNode>("TrigPos", false)),
00046     m_trigLevel(create<XDoubleNode>("TrigLevel", false)),
00047     m_timeWidth(create<XDoubleNode>("TimeWidth", false)),
00048     m_vFullScale1(create<XComboNode>("VFullScale1", false, true)),
00049     m_vFullScale2(create<XComboNode>("VFullScale2", false, true)),
00050     m_vOffset1(create<XDoubleNode>("VOffset1", false)),
00051     m_vOffset2(create<XDoubleNode>("VOffset2", false)),
00052     m_recordLength(create<XUIntNode>("RecordLength", false)),
00053     m_forceTrigger(create<XNode>("ForceTrigger", true)),  
00054     m_trace1(create<XComboNode>("Trace1", false)),
00055     m_trace2(create<XComboNode>("Trace2", false)),
00056     m_fetchMode(create<XComboNode>("FetchMode", false, true)),
00057     m_firEnabled(create<XBoolNode>("FIREnabled", false)),
00058     m_firBandWidth(create<XDoubleNode>("FIRBandWidth", false)),
00059     m_firCenterFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("FIRCenterFreq", false)),
00060     m_firSharpness(create<XDoubleNode>("FIRSharpness", false)),
00061     m_form(new FrmDSO(g_pFrmMain)),
00062     m_waveForm(create<XWaveNGraph>("WaveForm", false, 
00063                                    m_form->m_graphwidget, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump)),
00064     m_numChannelsDisp(0),
00065     m_rawDisplayOnly(false),

00067     m_conSingle(xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_singleSequence, m_form->m_ckbSingleSeq)),

00070     m_conTrigSource(xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_trigSource, m_form->m_cmbTrigSource)),
00071     m_conTrigPos(xqcon_create<XKDoubleNumInputConnector>(m_trigPos, m_form->m_numTrigPos)),
00072     m_conTrigLevel(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_trigLevel, m_form->m_edTrigLevel)),
00073     m_conTrigFalling(xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(m_trigFalling, m_form->m_ckbTrigFalling)),
00074     m_conFetchMode(xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_fetchMode, m_form->m_cmbFetchMode)),
00075     m_conTimeWidth(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_timeWidth, m_form->m_edTimeWidth)),
00076     m_conVFullScale1(xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_vFullScale1, m_form->m_cmbVFS1)),
00077     m_conVFullScale2(xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_vFullScale2, m_form->m_cmbVFS2)),
00078     m_conVOffset1(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_vOffset1, m_form->m_edVOffset1)),
00079     m_conVOffset2(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_vOffset2, m_form->m_edVOffset2)),

00081     m_conRecordLength(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_recordLength, m_form->m_edRecordLength)),

00088     m_form->m_btnForceTrigger->setIconSet(
00089         KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("apply", 
00090                                                                 KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) );  
00091     m_form->m_numTrigPos->setRange(0.0, 100.0, 1.0, true);
00092     
00093     singleSequence()->value(true);
00094     firBandWidth()->value(1000.0);
00095     firCenterFreq()->value(.0);
00096     firSharpness()->value(4.5);
00097   
00098     m_lsnOnCondChanged = firEnabled()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00099         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onCondChanged);
00100     firBandWidth()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00101     firCenterFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00102     firSharpness()->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnOnCondChanged);
00103   
00104     {
00105         const char *modes[] = {"Never", "Averaging", "Sequence", 0L};
00106         for(const char **mode = &modes[0]; *mode; mode++)
00107             fetchMode()->add(*mode);
00108     }
00109     fetchMode()->value(FETCHMODE_SEQ);
00110   
00111     average()->setUIEnabled(false);
00112     singleSequence()->setUIEnabled(false);
00113 //  fetchMode()->setUIEnabled(false);
00114     timeWidth()->setUIEnabled(false);

00121     vOffset1()->setUIEnabled(false);
00122     vOffset2()->setUIEnabled(false);
00123     forceTrigger()->setUIEnabled(false);
00124     recordLength()->setUIEnabled(false);
00125   
00126     m_waveForm->setColCount(2, s_trace_names); 
00127     m_waveForm->graph()->persistence()->value(0);
00128     m_waveForm->clear();
00129 }

00137 void
00138 XDSO::start()
00139 {
00140     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XDSO>(shared_from_this(), &XDSO::execute));
00141     m_thread->resume();
00142   
00143 //  trace1()->setUIEnabled(false);
00144 //  trace2()->setUIEnabled(false);
00145   
00146     average()->setUIEnabled(true);
00147     singleSequence()->setUIEnabled(true);
00148     timeWidth()->setUIEnabled(true);
00149     trigSource()->setUIEnabled(true);
00150     trigPos()->setUIEnabled(true);
00151     trigLevel()->setUIEnabled(true);
00152     trigFalling()->setUIEnabled(true);
00153     vFullScale1()->setUIEnabled(true);
00154     vFullScale2()->setUIEnabled(true);
00155     vOffset1()->setUIEnabled(true);
00156     vOffset2()->setUIEnabled(true);
00157     forceTrigger()->setUIEnabled(true);
00158     recordLength()->setUIEnabled(true);
00159 }

00171     trigLevel()->setUIEnabled(false);
00172     trigFalling()->setUIEnabled(false);
00173     vFullScale1()->setUIEnabled(false);
00174     vFullScale2()->setUIEnabled(false);
00175     vOffset1()->setUIEnabled(false);
00176     vOffset2()->setUIEnabled(false);
00177     forceTrigger()->setUIEnabled(false);
00178     recordLength()->setUIEnabled(false);  
00179     
00180     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00181 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00182 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00183 
00184     m_numChannelsDisp = 0;

00186 unsigned int
00187 XDSO::lengthRecorded() const
00188 {
00189     return m_wavesRecorded.size() / numChannelsRecorded();
00190 }
00191 const double *
00192 XDSO::waveRecorded(unsigned int ch) const
00193 {
00194     return &m_wavesRecorded[lengthRecorded() * ch];
00195 }
00196 unsigned int
00197 XDSO::lengthDisp() const
00198 {
00199     return m_wavesDisp.size() / numChannelsDisp();
00200 }
00201 double *
00202 XDSO::waveDisp(unsigned int ch)
00203 {
00204     return &m_wavesDisp[lengthDisp() * ch];
00205 }
00206 
00207 void
00208 XDSO::visualize()
00209 {
00210     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_dispMutex);
00211   
00212     m_statusPrinter->clear();
00213   
00214 //  if(!time()) {
00215 //      m_waveForm->clear();
00216 //      return;
00217 //  }
00218     const unsigned int num_channels = numChannelsDisp();
00219     if(!num_channels) {
00220         m_waveForm->clear();
00221         return;
00222     }
00223     const unsigned int length = lengthDisp();
00224     { XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_waveForm);
00225     m_waveForm->setColCount(num_channels + 1, s_trace_names);
00226     if(m_waveForm->numPlots() != num_channels) {
00227         m_waveForm->clearPlots();
00228         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00229             m_waveForm->insertPlot(s_trace_names[i + 1], 0, i + 1);
00230         }
00231         m_waveForm->axisy()->label()->value(KAME::i18n("Traces [V]"));
00232     }
00233     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00234         m_waveForm->plot(i)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00235     }
00236           
00237     m_waveForm->setRowCount(length);
00238     
00239     double *times = m_waveForm->cols(0);
00240     double tint = timeIntervalDisp();
00241     double t = -trigPosDisp() * tint;
00242     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00243         *times++ = t;
00244         t += tint;
00245     }
00246         
00247     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00248         memcpy(m_waveForm->cols(i + 1), waveDisp(i), length * sizeof(double));
00249     }
00250     }
00251 }
00252 
00253 void *
00254 XDSO::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00255 {
00256     XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00257     int last_count = 0;
00258   
00259     m_lsnOnAverageChanged = average()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00260         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onAverageChanged);
00261     m_lsnOnSingleChanged = singleSequence()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00262         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onSingleChanged);
00263     m_lsnOnTimeWidthChanged = timeWidth()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00264         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTimeWidthChanged);
00265     m_lsnOnTrigSourceChanged = trigSource()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00266         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigSourceChanged);
00267     m_lsnOnTrigPosChanged = trigPos()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00268         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigPosChanged);
00269     m_lsnOnTrigLevelChanged = trigLevel()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00270         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigLevelChanged);
00271     m_lsnOnTrigFallingChanged = trigFalling()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00272         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrigFallingChanged);
00273     m_lsnOnTrace1Changed = trace1()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00274         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrace1Changed);
00275     m_lsnOnTrace2Changed = trace2()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00276         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onTrace2Changed);
00277     m_lsnOnVFullScale1Changed = vFullScale1()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00278         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVFullScale1Changed);
00279     m_lsnOnVFullScale2Changed = vFullScale2()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00280         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVFullScale2Changed);
00281     m_lsnOnVOffset1Changed = vOffset1()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00282         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVOffset1Changed);
00283     m_lsnOnVOffset2Changed = vOffset2()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00284         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onVOffset2Changed);
00285     m_lsnOnForceTriggerTouched = forceTrigger()->onTouch().connectWeak(
00286         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onForceTriggerTouched);
00287     m_lsnOnRecordLengthChanged = recordLength()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00288         shared_from_this(), &XDSO::onRecordLengthChanged);
00289 
00290     while(!terminated) {
00291         const int fetch_mode = *fetchMode();
00292         if(!fetch_mode || (fetch_mode == FETCHMODE_NEVER)) {
00293             msecsleep(50);
00294             continue;
00295         }
00296         bool seq_busy = false;
00297         try {
00298             int count = acqCount(&seq_busy);
00299             if(!count) {
00300                 time_awared = XTime::now();
00301                 last_count = 0;
00302                 msecsleep(10);
00303                 continue;
00304             }
00305             if(count == last_count) {
00306                 msecsleep(10);
00307                 continue;
00308             }
00309             if(fetch_mode == FETCHMODE_SEQ) {
00310                 if(*singleSequence() && seq_busy) {
00311                     msecsleep(10);
00312                     continue;
00313                 }
00314             }
00315             last_count =  count;
00316         }
00317         catch (XKameError& e) {
00318             e.print(getLabel());
00319             continue;
00320         }
00321 
00322         std::deque<std::string> channels;
00323         channels.push_back(trace1()->to_str());
00324         if(channels.front().empty()) {
00325             statusPrinter()->printMessage(getLabel() + " " + KAME::i18n("Select traces!."));
00326             continue;
00327         }
00328         channels.push_back(trace2()->to_str());
00329         if(channels.back().empty()) {
00330             channels.pop_back();
00331         }
00332       
00333         clearRaw();
00334         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00335         try {
00336             getWave(channels);
00337         }
00338         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00339             continue;
00340         }
00341         catch (XKameError &e) {
00342             e.print(getLabel());
00343             continue;
00344         }
00345       
00346         m_rawDisplayOnly = (*singleSequence() && seq_busy);
00347 
00348         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00349           
00350         if(*singleSequence() && !seq_busy) {
00351             last_count = 0;
00352             time_awared = XTime::now();
00353             // try/catch exception of communication errors
00354             try {
00355                 startSequence();
00356             }
00357             catch (XKameError &e) {
00358                 e.print(getLabel());
00359                 continue;
00360             }
00361         }
00362     }
00363     m_rawDisplayOnly = false;
00364 
00365     m_lsnOnAverageChanged.reset();
00366     m_lsnOnSingleChanged.reset();
00367     m_lsnOnTimeWidthChanged.reset();
00368     m_lsnOnTrigSourceChanged.reset();
00369     m_lsnOnTrigPosChanged.reset();
00370     m_lsnOnTrigLevelChanged.reset();
00371     m_lsnOnTrigFallingChanged.reset();
00372     m_lsnOnVFullScale1Changed.reset();
00373     m_lsnOnVFullScale2Changed.reset();
00374     m_lsnOnTrace1Changed.reset();
00375     m_lsnOnTrace2Changed.reset();
00376     m_lsnOnVOffset1Changed.reset();
00377     m_lsnOnVOffset2Changed.reset();
00378     m_lsnOnForceTriggerTouched.reset();
00379     m_lsnOnRecordLengthChanged.reset();
00380                             
00381     afterStop();
00382 
00383     return NULL;
00384 }

00386 void
00387 XDSO::onCondChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00388 {
00389 //  readLockRecord();
00390     visualize();
00391 //  readUnlockRecord();

00393 void
00394 XDSO::setParameters(unsigned int channels, double startpos, double interval, unsigned int length)
00395 {
00396     m_numChannelsDisp = channels;
00397     m_wavesDisp.resize(channels * length, 0.0);
00398     m_trigPosDisp = -startpos / interval;
00399     m_timeIntervalDisp = interval;
00400 }
00401 void
00402 XDSO::convertRawToDisp() throw (XRecordError&) {
00403     convertRaw();
00404     
00405     unsigned int num_channels = numChannelsDisp();
00406     if(!num_channels) {
00407         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00408     }
00409     if(*firEnabled()) {
00410         double  bandwidth = *firBandWidth()*1000.0*timeIntervalDisp();
00411         double fir_sharpness = *firSharpness();
00412         if(fir_sharpness < 4.0)
00413             m_statusPrinter->printWarning(KAME::i18n("Too small number of taps for FIR filter."));
00414         int taps = std::min((int)lrint(2 * fir_sharpness / bandwidth), 5000);
00415         double center = *firCenterFreq() * 1000.0 * timeIntervalDisp();
00416         if(!m_fir || (taps != m_fir->taps()) || (bandwidth != m_fir->bandWidth()) || (center != m_fir->centerFreq()))
00417             m_fir.reset(new FIR(taps, bandwidth, center));
00418         unsigned int length = lengthDisp();
00419         std::vector<double> buf(length);
00420         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < num_channels; i++) {
00421             m_fir->exec(waveDisp(i), &buf[0], length);
00422             memcpy(waveDisp(i), &buf[0], length * sizeof(double));
00423         }
00424     }
00425 }
00426 void
00427 XDSO::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&) {
00428     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_dispMutex);
00429 
00430     convertRawToDisp();
00431 
00432     if(m_rawDisplayOnly) {
00433         throw XSkippedRecordError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00434     }
00435 //    std::fill(m_wavesRecorded.begin(), m_wavesRecorded.end(), 0.0);
00436     m_numChannelsRecorded = m_numChannelsDisp;
00437     m_wavesRecorded.resize(m_wavesDisp.size());
00438     m_trigPosRecorded = m_trigPosDisp;
00439     m_timeIntervalRecorded = m_timeIntervalDisp;
00440     memcpy(&m_wavesRecorded[0], &m_wavesDisp[0], m_wavesDisp.size() * sizeof(double));
00441 }
